room_title: Escape room "Chocolate Factory" by Escape Out in Asheville
room_address: 1987 Hendersonville Road Suite I, Asheville, NC 28801
room_description:
Everyone knew something wasn’t quite right when the old chocolatier missed an order of his famous chocolate treats. Rumor had it that the old master was growing ill and on the lookout for a successor but no one could quite live up to his impeccable standards. Soon after, the newspapers announced his passing. The great Chocolate Factory closed its doors forever.
The town was in a frenzy to take over his delicious treats but the doors to the factory seemed to be unbreakable until one day you and your friends discovered a series of clues left just outside the factory. Your mission is to get into the factory, get it up and running, and retrieve the master’s newest creations.
